scripts.prepare:bsc: mustache config/mainnet-bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.init:bsc: yarn prepare:bnb && graph init --product --network bnb hosted-service openluckteam/Openluck
scripts.deploy:bsc: graph auth --product hosted-service ${process.env.THEGRAPH_TOKEN_BSC} && graph deploy --product --network bnb hosted-service openluckteam/Openluck
